subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Stephen Strasburg’s pitching time is limited because of an innings limit designed to protect his surgically repaired arm. This would not be a big deal, except that the Nationals will likely host postseason games.
snippet: Stephen Strasburg’s pitching time is limited because of an innings limit designed to protect his surgically repaired arm. This would not be a big deal, except that the Nationals will likely host postseason games.
